entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
